link-text: Academic Men Explain Things to Me: Mansplaining starts early.
link-description:
mansplained:

Iâm a very traditionally religious Jewish woman, and at the time this story took place, I was living in a very traditionally religious Jewish neighborhood. One rainy, grey Sabbath as I walked the mile and a half from synagogue back to my home, I had a mischievous frame of mind, and so I started…
